languages.text: "Каллигос, твое отношение к протекторату безответственно. Или ты забыл, что смысл пребывания Вольных Торговцев в Просторе — это присоединять к Империуму новые миры и исправно выплачивать подать?"

"Calligos, your attitude toward your own protectorate is appallingly irresponsible. Have you forgotten that the mission of every Rogue Trader in the Expanse is to claim new worlds for the Imperium and ensure the payment of the Imperial Tithe?"
languages.original_text: "Каллигос, твое отношение к протекторату безответственно. Или ты забыл, что смысл пребывания Вольных Торговцев в Просторе — это присоединять к Империуму новые миры и исправно выплачивать подать?"

"Calligos, your attitude toward your own protectorate is appallingly irresponsible. Have you forgotten that the mission of every Rogue Trader in the Expanse is to claim new worlds for the Imperium and ensure the payment of the Imperial Tithe?"

languages.text: « Calligos, votre attitude à l'encontre de votre propre protectorat est tout bonnement irresponsable. Avez-vous oublié que votre mission, en tant que libre marchand des Étendues, est de conquérir de nouveaux mondes au nom de l'Imperium et de vous assurer de la perception de sa dîme ? »
languages.original_text: "Calligos, your attitude toward your own protectorate is appallingly irresponsible. Have you forgotten that the mission of every Rogue Trader in the Expanse is to claim new worlds for the Imperium and ensure the payment of the Imperial Tithe?"

traits.locale_text: « Calligos, votre attitude à l'encontre de votre propre protectorat est tout bonnement irresponsable. Avez-vous oublié que votre mission, en tant que libre marchand des Étendues, est de conquérir de nouveaux mondes au nom de l'Imperium et de vous assurer de la perception de sa dîme ? »

languages.text: 「カリゴス、保護領に対する君の態度は実に無責任だ。忘れたのか？エクスパンスにいる全てのローグトレーダーの使命は、新たな惑星を帝国のものとし、帝国租税の納付を確実にすることだということを」
languages.original_text: "Calligos, your attitude toward your own protectorate is appallingly irresponsible. Have you forgotten that the mission of every Rogue Trader in the Expanse is to claim new worlds for the Imperium and ensure the payment of the Imperial Tithe?"

traits.locale_text: 「カリゴス、保護領に対する君の態度は実に無責任だ。忘れたのか？エクスパンスにいる全てのローグトレーダーの使命は、新たな惑星を帝国のものとし、帝国租税の納付を確実にすることだということを」

languages.text: "Calligos, protektorana karşı tutumun dehşet verici derecede sorumsuz. Enginlik'teki her bir Hür Tacir'in vazifesinin İmparatorluk'a yeni dünyalar kazandırmak ve İmparatorluk Aşarı'nın ödenmesini sağlamak olduğunu unuttun mu?"
languages.original_text: "Calligos, your attitude toward your own protectorate is appallingly irresponsible. Have you forgotten that the mission of every Rogue Trader in the Expanse is to claim new worlds for the Imperium and ensure the payment of the Imperial Tithe?"

traits.locale_text: "Calligos, protektorana karşı tutumun dehşet verici derecede sorumsuz. Enginlik'teki her bir Hür Tacir'in vazifesinin İmparatorluk'a yeni dünyalar kazandırmak ve İmparatorluk Aşarı'nın ödenmesini sağlamak olduğunu unuttun mu?"

languages.text: «Calligos, su actitud hacia su propio protectorado es de una irresponsabilidad pasmosa. ¿Ha olvidado que la misión de cualquier Comerciante Independiente en la Extensión es conquistar nuevos mundos para el Imperium y asegurar el pago del diezmo Imperial?».
languages.original_text: "Calligos, your attitude toward your own protectorate is appallingly irresponsible. Have you forgotten that the mission of every Rogue Trader in the Expanse is to claim new worlds for the Imperium and ensure the payment of the Imperial Tithe?"

traits.locale_text: «Calligos, su actitud hacia su propio protectorado es de una irresponsabilidad pasmosa. ¿Ha olvidado que la misión de cualquier Comerciante Independiente en la Extensión es conquistar nuevos mundos para el Imperium y asegurar el pago del diezmo Imperial?».

languages.text: “卡里戈斯，你管理王朝的态度非常不负责任。你是不是忘了？科罗努斯扩区每位行商浪人的任务，都是为帝国开疆拓土，确保这些新的领地按时按量缴纳帝国什一税。”
languages.original_text: "Calligos, your attitude toward your own protectorate is appallingly irresponsible. Have you forgotten that the mission of every Rogue Trader in the Expanse is to claim new worlds for the Imperium and ensure the payment of the Imperial Tithe?"

traits.locale_text: “卡里戈斯，你管理王朝的态度非常不负责任。你是不是忘了？科罗努斯扩区每位行商浪人的任务，都是为帝国开疆拓土，确保这些新的领地按时按量缴纳帝国什一税。”

languages.text: "Calligos, Eure Einstellung gegenüber Eurem Protektorat ist erschreckend verantwortungslos. Habt Ihr vergessen, dass jeder Freihändler in der Ausdehnung neue Welten für das Imperium in Besitz nehmen und die Entrichtung des imperialen Zehnts gewährleisten muss?"
languages.original_text: "Calligos, your attitude toward your own protectorate is appallingly irresponsible. Have you forgotten that the mission of every Rogue Trader in the Expanse is to claim new worlds for the Imperium and ensure the payment of the Imperial Tithe?"

traits.locale_text: "Calligos, Eure Einstellung gegenüber Eurem Protektorat ist erschreckend verantwortungslos. Habt Ihr vergessen, dass jeder Freihändler in der Ausdehnung neue Welten für das Imperium in Besitz nehmen und die Entrichtung des imperialen Zehnts gewährleisten muss?"
